example_sentence_en: I like to solder silver rings.
We need to melt the silver.
I melt small ingots for casting.
example_sentence_it: Fondo piccoli lingotti per la fusione.

example_sentence_en: I melted scrap gold last night.
example_sentence_it: Ho fuso oro di recupero ieri sera.

example_sentence_en: We plan to cast a pendant.
I cast small shapes in sand.
I casted a bronze coin today.
example_sentence_it: Ho colato una moneta in bronzo oggi.

example_sentence_en: I want to polish the ring.
I polish each piece by hand.

example_sentence_it: Lucidando si eliminano i graffi sottili.

example_sentence_en: We need to hammer the bezel.
I hammer the sheet into shape.
example_sentence_it: Martello la lastra per darle forma.

example_sentence_en: I hammered the texture this morning.
I need to saw the outline.
I sawed a slice off the sheet.
example_sentence_it: Ho segato una fetta dalla lastra.
Ricorda di limare i bordi taglienti.

example_sentence_en: I file the bezel until flush.
example_sentence_it: Limo il castone fino a filo.

example_sentence_en: We need to drill for the pin.
I drill tiny holes for rivets.
example_sentence_it: Foro piccoli fori per i rivetti.

example_sentence_en: Drilling must be slow in silver.

example_sentence_it: Incidendo si migliora con la pratica.

example_sentence_en: We need to set the ruby.
I set an opal last night.
example_sentence_it: Ho incastonato un opale ieri sera.

definition_en: soften metal by heating and slow cooling
example_sentence_en: I need to anneal the sheet.
I anneal the wire before bending.
example_sentence_it: Ricuocio il filo prima di piegarlo.
Ricuocendo si elimina la tensione nel metallo.

example_sentence_en: I sand the bezel until flush.
I sanded the pendant this morning.
We need to oxidize the brass.
I want to roll this ingot.
I rolled the strip to 0.5 mm.
We need to draw the wire thinner.
example_sentence_it: Dobbiamo trafilare il filo più sottile.
Trafilo filo di rame ogni giorno.

example_sentence_en: I drew silver wire last night.
example_sentence_it: Ho trafilato filo d'argento ieri sera.
Trafilando aumenta la resistenza del filo.

example_sentence_en: I measure the stone with calipers.
example_sentence_it: Misuro la pietra con il calibro.

example_sentence_en: We need to buff the pendant.
We will pickle the pieces now.

example_sentence_it: Decapando si elimina la colla bruna.

example_sentence_en: We need to bend the wire.
